players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was killed during the night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our fingers."
You: "I agree with Charlie. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia manipulate our votes."
You: "I believe we should focus on building trust and cooperation within our group. Let's try to gather more information about each other and work together to identify any suspicious behavior."
